pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 31, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 31, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
